visits.text: Village of Ahangama, authentic coastal community with preserved traditions.

activities.text: Introduction to stick fishing with local fishermen on their iconic poles.

visits.text: Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi Tree, cutting from Buddha's enlightenment tree, oldest historically documented tree in the world.

Kuttam Pokuna twin pools, masterpieces of ancient hydraulic engineering.

activities.text: Bicycle tour through the sacred ruins of Anuradhapura.

Meditation in the peaceful gardens of ancient monasteries.
Visit to a Buddhist statuette making workshop.

visits.text: Arugam Bay beach, world-renowned surf spot but still preserved.

activities.text: Surfing session on the legendary waves of Main Point.

visits.text: Dutch bridge of Batticaloa renowned for its mysterious sounds emitted at night.

activities.text: Nighttime walk on the bridge to listen to the enigmatic sounds of singing fish.

days_plan.itin_title: SECRET PATHS — OFF THE BEATEN TRACK 12 DAYS

visits.text: Drive north to Bentota, a coastal paradise with golden beaches and rivers.

Bentota River, peaceful estuary bordered by mangroves.

Bentota Beach, long stretch of sand bordered by palm trees.

Water sports on the beach: jet-ski, windsurfing or kayak.

visits.text: Coconut plantation with demonstration of oil and toddy production.

Pettah district, chaotic and colorful market with its themed alleyways.

activities.text: Taste fresh kottu roti prepared in front of you at a street restaurant.

Shopping at Odel shopping center or in local craft shops.

Last purchases of souvenirs and spices at the local market.

activities.text: Sunrise hike to the temple for magical lighting.

visits.text: Dondra Lighthouse, southernmost point of Sri Lanka with panoramic view.

days_plan.itin_title: SECRET PATHS — OFF THE BEATEN TRACK 12 DAYS

visits.text: Take the famous train from Kandy to Ella through lush tea plantations and mountain tunnels.

Visit the iconic Nine Arch Bridge surrounded by tea fields.
Explore Ravana Falls, one of Sri Lanka’s most famous waterfalls.
Nine Arches Bridge, iconic railway bridge nestled in the jungle.
Café Chill with panoramic mountain views, specializing in creative vegetarian dishes.
Mini Adam's Peak with stop at mountain restaurants serving homemade rice and curry.
Prenez le célèbre train de Kandy à Ella à travers les luxuriantes plantations de thé et les tunnels de montagne.

Randonnée jusqu'au Little Adam's Peak pour des vues panoramiques sur les montagnes.
Visitez l'emblématique Pont aux Neuf Arches entouré de champs de thé.
Explorez les Chutes de Ravana, l'une des cascades les plus célèbres du Sri Lanka.

activities.text: Evening walk through Ella town to explore its cafés and shops.
Enjoy a relaxing evening overlooking Ella Rock from your homestay.
Scenic train journey from Nanu Oya to Ella, one of the most beautiful railway routes in the world.
Scenic train journey through tea plantations with local snack tasting on board.
Promenade en soirée dans la ville d'Ella pour explorer ses cafés et boutiques.
Profitez d'une soirée relaxante avec vue sur Ella Rock depuis votre famille d'accueil.

visits.text: Galle Fort, Dutch colonial fortress UNESCO-listed with ramparts facing the ocean.

National Maritime Museum tracing the colonial and maritime history of the region.

Dutch Reformed Church, 18th century church with tombstone floor.
National maritime museum retracing the colonial epic and spice trade.

activities.text: Strolling through the fort's cobbled streets in search of art galleries and craft shops.
Walk on the ramparts at sunset with ocean view.

visits.text: Drive through the southern countryside to reach Hiriketiya Bay.

Traversée de la campagne du sud pour rejoindre la baie d'Hiriketiya.

visits.text: Visit the historical Colombo Fort area before boarding the train to Kandy.

Walk around Kandy Market to experience local life and spices.
Temple of the Sacred Tooth, sanctuary housing a relic of Buddha, holy site of Buddhism.
Peradeniya Botanical Garden, 60 hectares of tropical vegetation with rare orchids and majestic palm trees.

Kandy Cultural Centre with traditional Kandyan dance performance.

Visitez le quartier historique de Colombo Fort avant de monter à bord du train pour Kandy.

Promenez-vous au Marché de Kandy pour découvrir la vie locale et les épices.

Evening cultural dance show in Kandy featuring Kandyan drummers and dancers.

Visit to a jaggery candy factory with tasting.
Dinner show with Kandyan dances and buffet of local specialties.

Spectacle de danse culturelle en soirée à Kandy mettant en vedette des percussionnistes et danseurs kandyens.

activities.text: Immersion in a farming family to discover ancestral cultivation techniques.

activities.text: Coastal hike to isolated coves accessible only on foot.
